x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: HomesteadNow is a social initiative that connects people who suffer natural disasters - floods, fire, earthquake etc with community members who are able to provide home.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

ServiceNow customer service management and its suite of applications will provide a centralized location to handle inquiry, issues and complaints promptly to resolution.
Surveys and assessments will be utilized to capture sentiment and feedback.

Different case types can be uncovered from reports and performance analytics, as well as the need to deploy the Conversational chat to meet constituents 24/7.

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

 

CRM: Customer Service Management and Global business service suite

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Case, CSM VA conversations, CSM portal will all be used to provide a single pane of glass to resolve constituents issues

Collaboration amongst stakeholders; governmant, organizations and civil society groups.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Need to maintain the data privacy laws and safeguards.

Resources both manpower and material

Need for prestine and representative data.

Processes that are mapped to the CSM capabilites and case types based on customer feedback.
